content:
I'm happy to help you with your shopping plans, but I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or interactions with individuals, so I didn't know you had a dog named Lola or a vet visit.

However, I'm glad you're considering checking out Petco for dog beds and pet grooming kits! They usually have a wide selection of products from various brands, and you might be able to find some good deals or discounts.

As for the vet visit, it's great that you were able to get a discounted consultation fee as a regular customer. It's always a good idea to ask about any promotions or discounts that may be available, especially for regular customers.

If you have any questions about dog beds or pet grooming kits, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to help!
